greenAbilityOptions.name: Always on the Move
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality]. Defend yourself using your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Fast Fingers
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost or Hinder using [power]. Use your Max die. If you roll doubles, you may also Attack using your Mid die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Immunity
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using [quality]. Use your Min die. Hinder each target equal to your Mid die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Blinding Strike
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using [quality]. Hinder each target equal to your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Flurry of Fists
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [quality]. Use your Max die. If you roll doubles, use Max+Min instead.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Supersonic Streak
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using [power]. Use your Max die against one target, and your Mid die against each other target. If you roll doubles, take irreducible damage equal to your Mid die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Speedy Analysis
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost multiple targets using [power]. Use your Max die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Sabotage
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality]. Remove one physical bonus or penalty, Hinder a target using your Min die, or maneuver to a new location in your environment.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Shadowy Figure
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality]. Defend using your Min die against all Attacks until your next turn.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Untouchable
greenAbilityOptions.text: When you would be dealt damage, roll a d4 while in the Green zone, d6 while in the Yellow, or d8 while in Red. Reduce the damage you take by the value rolled. Attack another target with that roll.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Overcome From the Darkness
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack or Overcome using [power/quality]. Boost yourself using your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Diversion
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When you would take damage, Defend against that damage by rolling your single [power/quality] die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Damage Resistant
greenAbilityOptions.text: Reduce any physical or energy damage you take by 1 while you are in the Green zone, 2 while in the Yellow zone, and 3 while in the Red zone.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Frontline Fighting
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality]. The target of that Attack must take an Attack action against you as its next turn, if possible.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Galvanize
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost using [power/quality]. Apply that bonus to all hero Attack and Overcome actions until the start of your next turn.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Power Strike
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality] and use your Max die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Strength in Victory
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality] and use your Max die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Damage Resistant
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Reduce any physical or energy damage you take by 1 while you are in the Green zone, 2 while in the Yellow zone, and 3 while in the Red zone.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Frontline Fighting
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality]. The target of that Attack must take an Attack action against you as its next turn, if possible.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Galvanize
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost using [power/quality]. Apply that bonus to all hero Attack and Overcome actions until the start of your next turn.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Power Strike
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality] and use your Max die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Strength in Victory
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality] and use your Max die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Dual Wielder
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack two different targets using [power/quality], one target using your Mid die and the other your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Load
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost using [power/quality] to create one bonus using your Max die and another using your Mid die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Precise Shot
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality]. Ignore all penalties on this Attack, ignore any Defend actions, and it cannot be affected by Reactions.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Spin & Shoot
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality]. Defend using your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Sniper Aim
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power/quality]. Use your Max+Min dice. This bonus can only be used against one chosen target, and is persistent & exclusive against that target until it leaves the scene.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Called Shot
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [quality]. Create a Boost for another hero using your Max die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Exploding Ammo
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack or Overcome using [quality] on an environmental target, using your Max+Min dice. If you roll doubles, take a minor twist.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Hair Trigger Reflexes
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When a new target enters close range, Attack that target by rolling your single [quality] die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Ricochet
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [quality]. Use your Max die. If you roll doubles, use Max+Min instead.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Exploit Vulnerability
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. If you Attacked or Hindered that target in your previous turn, use your Max die in this Attack.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Disabling Blast
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Hinder using your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Danger Zone
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using [power]. Use your Min die against each.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Precise Hit
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Ignore all penalties on this Attack, ignore any Defend actions, and it cannot be affected by Reactions.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Energy Immunity
yellowAbilityOptions.text: If you would take damage from [element/energy you have a related power for], instead reduce that damage to 0 and Recover that amount of Health instead.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Heedless Blast
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using [power]. Use your Mid die against each target. Take irreducible damage equal to your Mid die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Imbue with Element
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Use your Max die. If you choose another hero to go next, Boost that hero using your Mid die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Defensive Strike
greenAbilityOptions.text: Defend using [power/quality]. Attack using your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Dual Strike
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack one target using [power/quality]. Attack a second target using your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Flexible Stance
greenAbilityOptions.text: Take any two basic actions using [power/quality], each using your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Offensive Strike
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality]. Use your Max die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Precise Strike
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality]. Ignore all penalties on this Attack, ignore any Defend actions, and it cannot be affected by Reactions.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Throw Minion
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack a minion using [power]. Whatever that minion rolls as defense Attacks another target of your choice.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Defensive Strike
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Defend using [power/quality]. Attack using your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Dual Strike
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack one target using [power/quality]. Attack a second target using your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Flexible Stance
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Take any two basic actions using [power/quality], each using your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Offensive Strike
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality]. Use your Max die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Precise Strike
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality]. Ignore all penalties on this Attack, ignore any Defend actions, and it cannot be affected by Reactions.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Throw Minion
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack a minion using [power]. Whatever that minion rolls as defense Attacks another target of your choice.

guaranteedGreenAbilities.name: Armored
guaranteedGreenAbilities.text: Reduce any physical or energy damage you take by 1 while you are in the Green zone, 2 while in the Yellow zone, and 3 while in the Red zone.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Deflect
greenAbilityOptions.text: When you would be dealt damage, you may deal damage to a nearby target equal to the amount reduced by your Armored ability.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Dual Offense
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Attack a second target with your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Living Bulwark
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Defend another target with your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Repair
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Recover Health equal to your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Unstoppable Charge
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality]. Ignore all penalties on this Attack, ignore any Defend actions, and it cannot be affected by Reactions.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Aerial Bombardment
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack up to three targets using [power/quality]. Apply your Min die to each of them.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Aerial Surveillance
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost using [power/quality]. Apply that bonus to all hero Attack and Overcome actions until your next turn.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Barrel Roll
greenAbilityOptions.text: When you are Attacked while Flying, you may Defend yourself by rolling your single [power/quality] die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Dive & Drop
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack a minion using [power]. Use whatever that minion rolls for its save as an Attack against another target of your choice..

greenAbilityOptions.name: Sonic Boom
greenAbilityOptions.text: Hinder multiple targets using [power]. Apply your Min die to each of them.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Strike & Swoop
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality]. Defend against all Attacks against you using your Min die until your next turn.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Aerial Bombardment
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack up to three targets using [power/quality]. Apply your Min die to each of them.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Aerial Surveillance
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost using [power/quality]. Apply that bonus to all hero Attack and Overcome actions until your next turn.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Barrel Roll

yellowAbilityOptions.text: Hinder multiple targets using [power]. Apply your Min die to each of them.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Strike & Swoop
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power/quality]. Defend against all Attacks against you using your Min die until your next turn.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Backlash
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Take damage equal to your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: External Combustion
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack up to two targets using [power]. Also take an amount of damage equal to your Mid die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Energy Conversion
greenAbilityOptions.text: Defend using [power]. Use your Max die. Boost using your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Focused Apparatus
greenAbilityOptions.text: Hinder using [power]. Attack using your Min die. If you are in the Red zone, you may apply the penalty to any number of nearby targets.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Damage Spike
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Use your Max+Min dice. Take damage equal to your Mid die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Energy Alignment
yellowAbilityOptions.text: If you would take damage from [element/energy you have a related power for], reduce that damage to 0 and Recover that amount of Health instead.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Energy Redirection
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Whenever you take damage from [element/energy you have a related power for], you may also inflict that much damage on another target.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Live Dangerously
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using [power]. Take damage equal to your Max die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Adaptive Programming
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power], and Defend with your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Metal Skin
greenAbilityOptions.text: Reduce the amount of physical damage taken by 1 while you are in the green zone, 2 while in the Yellow zone, and 3 while in the Red zone.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Living Arsenal
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power] with a bonus equal to the number of bonuses you currently have.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Self-Improvement
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power]. That bonus is persistent and exclusive.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Something for Everyone
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Use your Mid die to Attack one extra target for each bonus you have. Apply a different bonus to each Attack.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Adaptive Programming
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power], and Defend with your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Metal Skin
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Reduce the amount of physical damage taken by 1 while you are in the green zone, 2 while in the Yellow zone, and 3 while in the Red zone.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Living Arsenal
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power] with a bonus equal to the number of bonuses you currently have.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Self-Improvement
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power]. That bonus is persistent and exclusive.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Something for Everyone
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Use your Mid die to Attack one extra target for each bonus you have. Apply a different bonus to each Attack.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Banish
greenAbilityOptions.text: Hinder using [power] . Use your Max die. If you roll doubles, also Attack using your Mid die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Energy Jaunt
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using [power], applying your Min die against each.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Powerful Blast
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power] and use your Max die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Subdue
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Hinder the same target using your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Cords of Magic
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Destroy all bonuses and penalties on a target. Then, Hinder that target using [power], using your Max die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Field of Energy
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets near each other using [power].

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Living Bomb
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Destroy one d6 or d8 minion. Roll that minion’s die as an Attack against another target.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Psychic Assault
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [Psychic power]. Hinder the target using your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Psychic Coordination
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost using [Psychic power]. Apply that bonus to all hero Attack and Overcome actions until your next turn.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Psychic Insight
greenAbilityOptions.text: After rolling during your turn, you may take 1 damage to reroll your entire dice pool.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Astral Projection
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Overcome using Remote Viewing and use your Max+Min dice. You do not have to be physically present in the area you are Overcoming.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Illusionary Double
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When you are Attacked, Defend by rolling your single Illusions die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Minion Suggestion
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack a minion using Suggestion. If that minion would be taken out, you control its next action, and then it is removed. Otherwise, Hinder it using your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Precognitive Alteration
yellowAbilityOptions.text: After an ally rolls dice to take an action for their turn but before using the result, Boost that ally’s roll using your single Precognition die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Postcognitive Understanding
yellowAbilityOptions.text: After an enemy rolls dice to take an action for their turn but before using the result, Hinder that enemy’s roll using your single Postcognition die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Psychic Analysis
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [Mental quality]. Either use your Max die, or use your Mid die and make it persistent.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Swarm
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using Animal Control and use your min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Telekinetic Assault
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using Telekinesis. Either Attack one target and use your max die, or two targets and use your Mid die against one and your Min die against another

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Telepathic Whammy
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using Telepathy and use your Max die. Hinder the target with a persistent penalty equal to your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Displacement Assault
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Either Hinder your target with your Min die or move them somewhere else in the scene.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Hit & Run
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Defend against all Attacks against you using your Min die until your next turn.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Mobile Dodge
greenAbilityOptions.text: When you are hit with an Attack, you may take 1 irreducible damage to have the attacker reroll their dice pool.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Mobile Assist
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost another hero using [power]. Attack using your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Run Down
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using [power]. Use your Min die against each.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Displacement Assault
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Either Hinder your target with your Min die or move them somewhere else in the scene.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Hit & Run
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Defend against all Attacks against you using your Min die until your next turn.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Mobile Dodge
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When you are hit with an Attack, you may take 1 irreducible damage to have the attacker reroll their dice pool.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Mobile Assist
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost another hero using [power]. Attack using your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Run Down
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using [power]. Use your Min die against each.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Make Minion
greenAbilityOptions.text: Create a minion using [power]. Reference the minion chart to see what size of minion it is. Choose whether it can Attack, Defend, Boost, Hinder, or Overcome. It acts on the start of your turn. You can only use this ability in a situation conducive to how you create minions.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Power Up
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost another hero or one of your minions using [power]. Either use your Max die, or use your Mid die and make that bonus persistent.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Minion Formation
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Reduce any damage you take by the number of minions you have. Whenver damage is reduced this way, reduce the size of one of your minions.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Rapid Deployment
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Create a minion using [power] using your Min die, and reference the minion chart to see what size of minion it is. It acts now and at the start of your turns.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Upgrade Minion
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost one of your minions using [power]. You may also upgrade that minion to your Max die size, replacing its minion form.

additionalRedAbilityChoices.name: Construction Focus
additionalRedAbilityChoices.text: Create two minions using [power], one with your Max die and one with your Mid die. Choose which one basic action each of them can perform. They act on the start of your turn.

additionalRedAbilityChoices.name: Swarm Combat
additionalRedAbilityChoices.text: Attack using [power]. Use your Max die plus a bonus equal to the number of minions you have.

additionalRedAbilityChoices.name: Sacrifice
additionalRedAbilityChoices.text: When you are Attacked, redirect the Attack to one of your nearby minions.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Gimmick
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost or Hinder using [power]. Use your Max die. If you roll doubles, you may also Attack using your Mid die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Multitask
greenAbilityOptions.text: Take any two different basic actions using [power/quality], each using your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Surprise Results
greenAbilityOptions.text: After rolling your dice pool for the turn, you may lose 1 Health to reroll your entire pool.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Unknown Results
greenAbilityOptions.text: Take any basic action using [power]. Then roll a d6. On 1, Boost with your Min die. On 2, Hinder with your Min die. On 3, Defend with your Min die. On 4, lose Health equal to your Min die. On 5, your basic action uses your Max die. On 6, your basic action uses your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Break the 4th
yellowAbilityOptions.text: You may uncheck a checked off collection on your hero sheet.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Danger!
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using [power]. If you roll doubles, one nearby ally is also hit with the Attack

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Expect the Unexpected
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Apply a bonus after rolling your action, instead of before.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Imitation
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Use a Green action ability of a nearby ally (using the same size power/quality die they would use.)

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Turn the Tables
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Change any bonus into a penalty of equal size or vice versa.

guaranteedGreenAbilities.name: Change Forms
guaranteedGreenAbilities.text: Take a basic action using [Self Control power], then switch to any available form.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Form Recovery
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [Self Control power] and Recover Health equal to your Min die. Return to your base form.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Surprise Shift
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [Self Control power] and use your Max die. Then change to any available form.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Analyze Probabilities
greenAbilityOptions.text: After rolling your dice pool, you may lose 1 Health to reroll your dice pool.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Analyze Weakness
greenAbilityOptions.text: Hinder using [power]. Use your Max die, or use your Mid die and make it persistent and exclusive.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Equip
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost using [power]. Make one bonus for one ally using your Mid die and another for another ally using your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Helpful Invention
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost using [power]. Use your Max die, or use your Mid die and make it persistent and exclusive.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Helpful Analysis
yellowAbilityOptions.text: One nearby ally may reroll their dice pool. You lose Health equal to the Min die of the new roll.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Snap Decision
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power]. Use your Max+Min dice. Then Attack using your Mid die with that bonus.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Turn the Tables
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Change any bonus into a penalty of equal size or vice versa.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Negative Likelihood
greenAbilityOptions.text: Hinder using [power]. That penalty is persistent and exlusive.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Not Quite Right
greenAbilityOptions.text: After a dice pool is rolled, adjust one die up or down one value on the die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Probability Insight
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost using [power]. Use your Max die. If you roll doubles, you may also Attack using your Mid die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Warp Space
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. You may move the target of that Attack anywhere else nearby. If the target goes next, you decide who takes the next turn after that.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Alternate Outcome
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When a nearby enemy rolls their dice pool for the turn, you may lose 1 Health to reroll their entire pool.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Helpful Analysis
yellowAbilityOptions.text: One nearby ally may reroll their dice pool. You lose Health equal to the Min die of the new roll.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Never Happened
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When a nearby enemy would create a bonus or penalty, you may remove it immediately.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Retroactive Rewrite
yellowAbilityOptions.text: You may apply a bonus to a roll after rolling instead of before.
